thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Yes, fees must fall

author: news24.com
title: Yes, fees must fall
text:
The current struggle waged by university students in South African universities is a just one.
History also teaches that people who take charge of their lives achieve their desired goals.
Some pessimists regard the gallant students as clueless and selfish. That is far from the actual facts.
Fees in SA universities have been used to excude the historically economically marginalised African masses in their own country.
SA can afford free education given the natural riches we are endowed with. It is a matter of reprioritising and putting education at the apex of national needs.
Cuba did it very well and we are richer! What an irony!
A country with so much being helped by one with so little!
In case you are wondering, SA sends our kids to study in Cuba.
